query_1.text: How did Michael Jackson's innovative approach to music videos and live performances redefine the entertainment industry and influence future artists across various genres?

query_2.text: How did Whitney Houston's unique blend of gospel influences and pop sensibilities contribute to her status as one of the most iconic vocalists in music history?

query_3.text: How did David Bowie's ability to continually reinvent his musical persona throughout his career influence the evolution of popular music and the perception of artist identity in the modern music industry?

query_4.text: How did Freddie Mercury's unique blend of theatricality and vulnerability in his performances contribute to his lasting impact on the music industry and popular culture?

query_5.text: How has Ariana Grande's evolution as an artist reflected broader changes in pop music trends and societal issues over the years?

query_6.text: How did Bob Marley's experiences in his early life and the socio-political climate of Jamaica influence the themes of resistance and unity in his music?
